characters.composition: Character positioned to the left, camera slightly low angle

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Character positioned to the right, camera slightly low angle

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Character positioned to the left, camera slightly low angle

text: “Oh, as to the whiting,” the Mock Turtle said, “they—you’ve seen them, of course?”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle centered, camera at eye level

text: I nodded, remembering the times I had seen them at dinner.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera at eye level

text: “Yes,” I replied, “I’ve often seen them at dinn—” I quickly stopped myself, realizing I might have said too much.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera at eye level

text: “I don’t know where Dinn may be,” the Mock Turtle said, “but if you’ve seen them so often, of course you know what they’re like.”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle centered, camera at eye level

text: I thought for a moment, trying to recall the details.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “I believe so,” I replied thoughtfully.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Gryphon

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera at eye level

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Mock Turtle

characters.name: I

characters.name: Mock Turtle

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera eye-level

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle positioned slightly to the right, camera at eye level

characters.name: Gryphon

characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Mock Turtle

characters.name: Gryphon

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: He
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character seated, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I

characters.name: Gardener One

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Gardener Five
characters.composition: Gardener positioned on the left, camera slightly overhead

text: “Seven jogged my elbow.”

characters.name: Seven
actions: jogging the elbow of the viewer
characters.composition: Seven positioned on the left side of the frame, camera at eye level

text: Seven looked up and said, “That’s right, Five! Always lay the blame on others!”

characters.name: Seven
characters.composition: Seven centered in the frame, camera slightly overhead

text: “You’d better not talk!” said Five.

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Five positioned on the right side of the frame, camera at eye level

text: “I heard the Queen say only yesterday you deserved to be beheaded!”

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Five centered in the frame, camera slightly overhead

text: “What for?” asked the one who had spoken first.

characters.name: Seven
actions: asking a question directly to the viewer

text: “That’s none of your business, Two!” said Seven.

text: “Yes, it is his business!” said Five.

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “And I’ll tell him—it was for bringing the cook tulip-roots instead of onions.”

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: Seven flung down his brush and was about to say, “Well, of all the unjust things—” when he noticed me standing there.

characters.name: Seven
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The other gardeners looked around, and all of them bowed low.

characters.name: Gardeners
characters.composition: Characters positioned in a line, camera slightly overhead

text: “Would you tell me,” I said, a little timidly, “why you are painting those roses?”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the side, camera at eye level

text: Five and Seven said nothing, but looked at Two.

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Character positioned to the left, camera at eye level

characters.name: Seven
characters.composition: Character positioned to the right, camera at eye level

text: Two began in a low voice, “Why the fact is, you see, Miss, this here ought to have been a red rose-tree, and we put a white one in by mistake; and if the Queen was to find it out, we should all have our heads cut off, you know.

characters.name: Two
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: So you see, Miss, we’re doing our best, afore she comes, to—”

characters.name: Gardener
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: At that moment, Five, who had been anxiously looking across the garden, called out, “The Queen! The Queen!”

characters.name: Five
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The three gardeners instantly threw themselves flat upon their faces.

characters.name: Gardener
actions: throwing self flat on the ground
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I heard the sound of many footsteps and looked around, eager to see the Queen.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: First came ten soldiers carrying clubs; they were all shaped like the three gardeners, oblong and flat, with their hands and feet at the corners.

characters.name: Soldiers
characters.composition: Soldiers in a line, camera slightly behind them

characters.name: Courts
characters.composition: Courts walking in pairs, camera slightly behind them

text: After them came the royal children; there were ten of them, and they were all jumping merrily along hand in hand, in couples, and were all ornamented.

characters.name: Royal Children
characters.composition: Children jumping in pairs, camera slightly behind them

text: Next came the guests, mostly Kings and Queens, and among them, I recognized the White Rabbit.

characters.composition: Character positioned on the left side of the frame, camera slightly overhead

text: It was talking in a hurried, nervous manner, smiling at everything that was said, and went by without noticing me.

characters.composition: Character positioned on the left side of the frame, camera slightly overhead

characters.composition: Character positioned on the right side of the frame, camera slightly overhead

text: Last of all this grand procession, came the King and Queen of Hearts.

characters.composition: Character positioned on the left, camera slightly low angle

characters.name: Queen of Hearts
characters.composition: Character positioned on the right, camera slightly low angle

text: I was rather doubtful whether I ought not to lie down on my face like the three gardeners, but I couldn’t remember ever having heard of such a rule at processions.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned centrally, camera eye-level

text: “And besides, what would be the use of a procession,” I thought, “if people had all to lie down upon their faces, so that they couldn’t see it?”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned centrally, camera eye-level

text: So I stood still where I was and waited.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: When the procession came opposite to me, they all stopped and looked at me.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The Queen said severely, “Who is this?”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: She said it to the Knave of Hearts, who only bowed and smiled in reply.

characters.name: Knave of Hearts
characters.composition: Knave of Hearts positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Idiot!” said the Queen, tossing her head impatiently; and, turning to Alice, she went on, “What’s your name, child?”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned on the left, camera slightly angled to capture her expression and movement

text: “My name is Alice, so please your Majesty,” I said very politely; but I added to myself, “Why, they’re only a pack of cards, after all.

characters.name: Alice
characters.composition: Alice positioned on the right, camera slightly angled to capture her expression and movement

text: “And who are _these?_” said the Queen, pointing to the three gardeners who were lying round the rose-tree; for, you see, as they were lying on their faces, and the pattern on their backs was the same as the rest of the pack, she could not tell whether they were gardeners, or soldiers, or courtiers,

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned on the left, camera slightly angled to capture her pointing gesture and the gardeners in the background

text: The Queen turned crimson with fury, and, after glaring at me for a moment like a wild beast, screamed “Off with her head!

characters.name: The Queen
characters.composition: The Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “Nonsense!” I said, very loudly and decidedly, and the Queen was silent.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: The King laid his hand upon her arm, and timidly said “Consider, my dear: she is only a child!”

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King on the left, Queen on the right, camera frontal

characters.name: Queen

characters.name: The Knave
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: The Queen

characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Leave off that!” screamed the Queen. “You make me giddy.”

characters.name: The Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned slightly to the left, camera slightly overhead

text: “May it please your Majesty,” said Two, in a very humble tone, going down on one knee as he spoke, “we were trying—”

characters.name: Two
characters.composition: Two positioned to the right, slightly lower than the Queen, camera at eye level

text: “_I_ see!” said the Queen, who had meanwhile been examining the roses.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned slightly to the left, camera slightly overhead

text: and the procession moved on, three of the soldiers remaining behind to execute the unfortunate gardeners, who ran to me for protection.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.composition: Gardener positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: “Off with their heads!”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I

characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: The three soldiers wandered about for a minute or two, looking for them, and then quietly marched off after the others.

characters.name: Soldiers
characters.composition: Characters positioned in a group, camera slightly behind them

text: “Are their heads off?” shouted the Queen.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Their heads are gone, if it please your Majesty!” the soldiers shouted in reply.

characters.name: Soldiers
characters.composition: Soldiers positioned in the foreground, camera slightly low angle

text: “That’s right!” shouted the Queen.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly high angle

text: “Can you play croquet?”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly high angle

text: The soldiers were silent, and looked at me, as the question was evidently meant for me.

characters.name: Soldiers
characters.composition: Soldiers positioned in the foreground, camera slightly low angle

text: “Yes!” I shouted. “Come on, then!”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: roared the Queen, and I joined the procession, wondering very much what would happen next.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “It’s—it’s a very fine day!” said a timid voice at my side.

characters.name: White Rabbit
characters.composition: White Rabbit positioned to the side, camera slightly overhead

text: I was walking by the White Rabbit, who was peeping anxiously into my face.

characters.name: White Rabbit
characters.composition: White Rabbit positioned to the side, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Character positioned to the left, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Rabbit

characters.composition: Character positioned to the left, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Rabbit positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

characters.name: I

text: I said ‘What for?’”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Rabbit positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “She boxed the Queen’s ears—” the Rabbit began.

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Rabbit positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: the Rabbit whispered in a frightened tone.

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: You see, she came rather late, and the Queen said—”

characters.name: Rabbit
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Get to your places!” shouted the Queen in a voice of thunder, and people began running about in all directions, tumbling up against each other; however, they got settled down in a minute or two, and the game began.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I thought I had never seen such a curious croquet-ground in my life; it was all ridges and furrows; the balls were live hedgehogs, the mallets live flamingos, and the soldiers had to double themselves up and to stand on their hands and feet, to make the arches.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: The chief difficulty I found at first was in managing my flamingo: I succeeded in getting its body tucked away, comfortably enough, under my arm, with its legs hanging down.

characters.name: I
actions: holding a flamingo under the arm
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: but generally, just as I had got its neck nicely straightened out, and was going to give the hedgehog a blow with its head, it would twist itself round and look up in my face, with such a puzzled expression that I could not help bursting out laughing.

characters.name: I
actions: holding a flamingo under the arm
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: The hedgehog had unrolled itself, and was in the act of crawling away.

characters.name: Hedgehog

characters.name: I

text: As the doubled-up soldiers were always getting up and walking off to other parts of the ground, I soon came to the conclusion that it was a very difficult game indeed.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned on the right, soldiers walking away on the left, camera at eye level

text: The players all played at once without waiting for turns, quarrelling all the while, and fighting for the hedgehogs.

characters.name: Player 1
characters.composition: Player 1 positioned on the left, Player 2 on the right, camera at eye level

text: And in a very short time the Queen was in a furious passion, and went stamping about, and shouting 'Off with his head!' or 'Off with her head!' to the rest of the players.

characters.name: Queen

characters.name: Queen

text: “The Queen will hear you! about once in a minute.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera eye-level

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera eye-level

text: “and then,” I thought, “what would become of me?

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera eye-level

text: They’re dreadfully fond of beheading people here; the great wonder is, that there’s any one left alive!”

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I was looking about for some way of escape, and wondering whether I could get away without being seen, when I noticed a curious appearance in the air:

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: it puzzled me very much at first, but, after watching it a minute or two, I made it out to be a grin, and I said to myself “It’s the Cheshire Cat: now I shall have somebody to talk to.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “How are you getting on?” said the Cat, as soon as there was mouth enough for it to speak with.

characters.name: Cat

characters.name: I

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera frontal

text: In another minute the whole head appeared, and then I put down my flamingo, and began an account of the game, feeling very glad I had someone to listen.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera frontal

characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “and they all quarrel so dreadfully one can’t hear oneself speak—and they don’t seem to have any rules in particular; at least, if there are, nobody attends to them—and you’ve no idea how confusing it is all the things

characters.name: Cat

characters.name: I

characters.name: I

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned on the right, camera slightly overhead

text: “Who _are_ you talking to?” the King asked, going up to me and looking at the Cat’s head with great curiosity.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned on the left, camera slightly overhead

text: “It’s a friend of mine—a Cheshire Cat,” I said: “allow me to introduce it.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “I don’t like the look of it at all,” the King said: “however, it may kiss my hand if it likes.”

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “I’d rather not,” the Cat remarked.

characters.name: Cat
characters.composition: Cat positioned centrally, camera eye-level

text: “Don’t be impertinent,” the King said, “and don’t look at me like that!”

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: He got behind me as he spoke.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned behind the viewer, camera slightly low angle

text: “A cat may look at a king,” I said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned centrally, camera eye-level

text: “Well, it must be removed,” the King said very decidedly, and he called the Queen, who was passing at the moment, “My dear!

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I wish you would have this cat removed!”

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The Queen had only one way of settling all difficulties, great or small.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Off with his head!” she said, without even looking round.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly behind her

text: “I’ll fetch the executioner myself,” the King eagerly said, and he hurried off.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly behind him

text: I thought I might as well go back, and see how the game was going on, as I heard the Queen’s voice in the distance, screaming with passion.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I had already heard her sentence three of the players to be executed for having missed their turns, and I didn’t like the look of things at all, as th

characters.name: I

text: The game was in such confusion that I never knew whether it was my turn or not.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera at eye level

text: The hedgehog was engaged in a fight with another hedgehog, which seemed to me an excellent opportunity for croqueting one of them with the other:

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera at eye level

text: the only difficulty was, that my flamingo was gone across to the other side of the garden, where I could see it trying in a helpless sort of way to fly up into a tree.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera at eye level

text: By the time I had caught the flamingo and brought it back, the fight was over, and both the hedgehogs were out of sight: “but it doesn’t matter much,”

characters.name: I

characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: I
actions: holding a flamingo under one arm
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: So I tucked it away under my arm, that it might not escape again, and went back for a little more conversation with my friend.

characters.name: I
actions: tucking the flamingo securely under the arm
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: When I got back to the Cheshire Cat, I was surprised to find quite a large crowd collected round it: there was a dispute going on between the executioner and the King of Hearts.

characters.name: Cheshire Cat
characters.composition: Cheshire Cat centered, camera slightly overhead

text: The King, the Queen, and the executioner were all talking at once, while all the rest were quite silent, and looked very uncomfortable.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned on the left, camera frontal

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned on the right, camera frontal

characters.name: Executioner
characters.composition: Executioner positioned in the center, camera frontal

text: The moment I appeared, I was appealed to by all three to settle the question, and they repeated their arguments to me, though, as they all spoke at once, I found it very hard indeed to make out exactly what they said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera frontal

text: The executioner’s argument was, that you couldn’t cut off a head unless there was a body to cut it off from: that he had never had to do such a thing.

characters.name: Executioner
characters.composition: Executioner positioned in the center, camera frontal

text: The King’s argument was, that anything that had a head could be beheaded, and that you weren’t to talk nonsense.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King centered, camera slightly low angle

text: The Queen’s argument was, that if something wasn’t done about it in less than no time she’d have everybody executed, all round.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: So I went in search of my hedgehog.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly behind

text: This last remark made everyone look so grave and anxious.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I could think of nothing else to say but “It belongs to the Duchess: you’d better ask _her_ about it.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the side, camera at eye level

text: The Queen turned to the executioner and said, “She’s in prison,” and then ordered, “fetch her here.”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The executioner nodded and went off like an arrow.

characters.name: Executioner
characters.composition: Character positioned at the edge of the frame, camera at eye level

characters.name: Cat
characters.composition: Cat's head centered, camera slightly overhead

characters.name: Executioner
characters.composition: Executioner and Duchess positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: The King and the executioner ran wildly up and down looking for it, while the rest of the party went back to the game.

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “You can’t think how glad I am to see you again, you dear old thing!” said the Duchess, as she tucked her arm affectionately into mine, and we walked on together.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess and I positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I was very glad to find her in such a pleasant temper, and thought to myself that perhaps it was only the pepper that had made her so savage when we met in the kitchen.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “When _I’m_ a Duchess,” I said to myself, (not in a very hopeful tone though), “I won’t have any pepper in my kitchen _at all_.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: Soup does very well without—Maybe it’s always pepper that makes people hot-tempered,” I went on, very much pleased at having found out a new kind of rule, “and vinegar that makes them sour—and camomile that makes them bitter—and—and barley-sugar and such things that make children sweet-tempered.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I only wish people knew _that_: then they wouldn’t be so stingy about it, you know—”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I had quite forgotten the Duchess by this time, and was a little startled when I heard her voice close to my ear.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “You’re thinking about something, my dear, and that makes you forget to talk.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I can’t tell you just now what the moral of that is, but I shall remember it in a bit.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Perhaps it hasn’t one,” I ventured to remark.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Tut, tut, child!” said the Duchess.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Everything’s got a moral, if only you can find it.”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: And she squeezed herself up closer to my side as she spoke.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: I did not much like keeping so close to her: first, because the Duchess was _very_ ugly; and secondly, because she was exactly the right height to rest her chin upon my shoulder, and it was an uncomfortably sharp chin.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “The game’s going on rather better now,” I said, by way of keeping up the conversation a little.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character on the left, Duchess on the right, camera slightly angled

text: “’Tis so,” said the Duchess: “and the moral of that is—‘Oh, ’tis love, ’tis love, that makes the world go round!’”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, main character slightly off to the side, camera frontal

text: “Somebody said,” I whispered, “that it’s done by everybody minding their own business!”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character on the left, Duchess on the right, camera slightly angled

text: “It means much the same thing,” said the Duchess, digging her sharp little chin into my shoulder as she added, “and the moral of _that_ is—‘Take care of the sense, and the sounds will take care of themselves.’”

characters.name: Duchess
actions: digging sharp little chin into shoulder
characters.composition: Duchess positioned to the left, camera slightly low angle

text: “How fond she is of finding morals in things!”

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Narrator positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “I dare say you’re wondering why I don’t put my arm round your waist,” the Duchess said after a pause: “the reason is, that I’m doubtful about the temper of your flamingo.”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess positioned to the left, camera slightly low angle

text: “Shall I try the experiment?”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.gaze_and_direction: direct eye contact with the camera
temporary_features: holding a vial in one hand
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “He might bite,” I cautiously replied, not feeling at all anxious to have the experiment tried.

characters.name: I
characters.gaze_and_direction: gaze slightly averted, looking at the Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the right, camera at eye level

text: “Very true,” said the Duchess: “flamingoes and mustard both bite.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.gaze_and_direction: direct eye contact with the camera
temporary_features: holding a vial in one hand
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: And the moral of that is—‘Birds of a feather flock together.’”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.gaze_and_direction: direct eye contact with the camera
temporary_features: holding a vial in one hand
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “Only mustard isn’t a bird,” I remarked.

characters.name: I
characters.gaze_and_direction: gaze slightly averted, looking at the Duchess
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the right, camera at eye level

text: “Right, as usual,” said the Duchess: “what a clear way you have of putting things!”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly low angle

text: “It’s a mineral, I _think_,” I said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Of course it is,” said the Duchess, who seemed ready to agree to everything that I said;

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly low angle

text: “there’s a large mustard-mine near here.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly low angle

text: And the moral of that is—‘The more there is of mine, the less there is of yours.’”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly low angle

text: “Oh, I know!”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I exclaimed, who had not attended to this last remark, “it’s a vegetable.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: It doesn’t look like one, but it is.”

characters.name: I
actions: holding the object up for inspection
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “I quite agree with you,” said the Duchess; “and the moral of that is—‘The more there is of yours, the less there is of mine.’”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Of course it is,” said the Duchess, who seemed ready to agree to everything that I said; “there’s a large mustard-mine near here.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Oh, I know!” I exclaimed, who had not attended to this last remark, “it’s a vegetable.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: It doesn’t look like one, but it is.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “I quite agree with you,” said the Duchess;

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “and the moral of that is—‘The more there is of yours, the less there is of mine.’”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “I think I should understand that better,” I said very politely, “if I had it written down: but I can’t quite follow it as you say it.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “That’s nothing to what I could say if I chose,” the Duchess replied, in a pleased tone.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Pray don’t trouble yourself to say it any longer than that,” I said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Oh, don’t talk about trouble!” said the Duchess.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera at eye level

text: “I make you a present of everything I’ve said as yet.”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.gaze_and_direction: looking slightly away from the viewer
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera at eye level

text: “A cheap sort of present!” I thought.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “I’m glad they don’t give birthday presents like that!”

characters.name: I
characters.gaze_and_direction: looking up, with a slight smile
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: But I did not venture to say it out loud.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “Thinking again?” the Duchess asked, with another dig of her sharp little chin.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “I’ve a right to think,” I said sharply, for I was beginning to feel a little worried.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: “Just about as much right,” said the Duchess, “as pigs have to fly; and the m—”

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera at eye level

text: But here, to my great surprise, the Duchess’s voice died away, even in the middle of her favourite word ‘moral,’ and the arm that was linked into mine began to tremble.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera at eye level

text: I looked up, and there stood the Queen in front of us, with her arms folded, frowning like a thunderstorm.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: “A fine day, your Majesty!” the Duchess began in a low, weak voice.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess centered, camera at eye level

text: “Now, I give you fair warning,” shouted the Queen, stamping on the ground as she spoke;

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: “either you or your head must be off, and that in about half no time!

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: Take your choice!”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: The Duchess took her choice, and was gone in a moment.

characters.name: Duchess
characters.composition: Duchess on the right side, camera slightly low angle

text: “Let’s go on with the game,” the Queen said to me;

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: and I was too much frightened to say a word, but slowly followed her back to the croquet-ground.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera slightly behind

text: The other guests had taken advantage of the Queen’s absence, and were resting in the shade:

characters.name: Guests
characters.composition: Guests positioned in the shade, camera slightly low angle

text: however, the moment they saw her, they hurried back to the game, the Queen merely remarking that a moment’s delay would cost them their lives.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: All the time they were playing, the Queen never left off quarrelling with the other players,

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: and shouting “Off with his head!”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: Those whom she sentenced were taken into custody by the soldiers, who of course had to leave off being arches to do this, so that by the end of half a n hour or so there were no arches left, and all the players, except the King, the Queen, and me, were in custody and under sentence of execution.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: Then the Queen left off, quite out of breath, and said to me, “Have you seen the Mock Turtle yet?”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “No,” I said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the side, camera at eye level

text: “I don’t even know what a Mock Turtle is.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the side, camera at eye level

text: “It’s the thing Mock Turtle Soup is made from,” said the Queen.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Off with her head!”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “I never saw one, or heard of one,” I said.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned slightly to the side, camera frontal

text: “Come on, then,” said the Queen, “and he shall tell you his history.”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: As we walked off together, I heard the King say in a low voice, to the company generally, “You are all pardoned.”

characters.name: King
characters.composition: King positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “Come, _that’s_ a good thing!”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I said to myself, for I had felt quite unhappy at the number of executions the Queen had ordered.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: We very soon came upon a Gryphon, lying fast asleep in the sun.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly overhead

text: (If you don’t know what a Gryphon is, look at the picture.)

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Up, lazy thing!” said the Queen, “and take this young lady to see the Mock Turtle, and to hear his history.

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen centered, camera slightly low angle

text: I must go back and see after some executions I have ordered.”

characters.name: Queen
characters.composition: Queen on the left, camera slightly low angle

text: I watched as the Queen walked off, leaving me alone with the Gryphon.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly low angle

text: I did not quite like the look of the creature, but on the whole, I thought it would be quite as safe to stay with it as to go after that savage Queen.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly low angle

text: So I waited. The Gryphon sat up and rubbed its eyes.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly low angle

text: Then it watched the Queen till she was out of sight.

characters.name: Gryphon
actions: watching the Queen disappear into the distance
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera at eye level

text: Then it chuckled.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera at eye level

text: "What fun!" said the Gryphon, half to itself, half to me.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera at eye level

text: "What _is_ the fun?" I asked.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character slightly off-center, camera at eye level

text: "Why, _she_," said the Gryphon.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera at eye level

text: “It’s all her fancy, that: they never executes nobody, you know.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: Come on!”

characters.name: Narrator
actions: gesturing with hand towards the viewer
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Everybody says ‘come on!’ here,” I thought to myself, as I went slowly after it.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “I never was so ordered about in all my life, never!”

characters.name: I
actions: stopping in front of the door, looking back at the viewer
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: We had not gone far before we saw the Mock Turtle in the distance, sitting sad and lonely on a little ledge of rock.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
actions: sitting on a ledge of rock
characters.composition: Character positioned on the left, camera slightly angled from a distance

text: As we came nearer, I could hear him sighing as if his heart would break.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: I pitied him deeply. "What is his sorrow?"

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character positioned on the right, camera slightly angled

text: The Gryphon answered, very nearly in the same words as before, "It’s all his fancy, that: he hasn’t got no sorrow, you know.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Character positioned on the left, camera slightly angled

text: I asked the Gryphon. Come on!

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly overhead

text: So we went up to the Mock Turtle, who looked at us with large eyes full of tears, but said nothing.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
actions: with large eyes full of tears
characters.composition: Mock Turtle centered, camera slightly overhead

text: "This here young lady," said the Gryphon, "she wants for to know your history, she do."

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Gryphon centered, camera slightly overhead

text: The Mock Turtle spoke in a deep, hollow tone: "I’ll tell it her."

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle centered, camera slightly overhead

text: Sit down, both of you, and don’t speak a word till I’ve finished.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Narrator positioned on the left side of the frame, camera slightly low angle

text: So we sat down, and nobody spoke for some minutes.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: I thought to myself, 'I don’t see how he can ever finish, if he doesn’t begin.'

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: But I waited patiently.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Once,” said the Mock Turtle at last, with a deep sigh, “I was a real Turtle.”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.gaze_and_direction: looking down, then up at the viewer
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “_I’ve_ been to a day-school, too,” I said, trying to match the Mock Turtle’s tone.

characters.name: I
actions: trying to match the Mock Turtle’s tone
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly to the left, camera at eye level

text: “You needn’t be so proud as all that.”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “With extras?” the Mock Turtle asked, a little anxiously.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly overhead

text: “Yes,” I replied, “we learned French and music.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “And washing?” the Mock Turtle inquired.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle positioned to the left, camera at eye level

text: “Certainly not!” I said indignantly.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly overhead

text: “Ah! then yours wasn’t a really good school,” the Mock Turtle said in a tone of great relief.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle positioned to the left, camera at eye level

text: “Now at _ours_ they had at the end of the bill, ‘French, music, _and washing_—extra.’”

characters.name: Narrator
characters.composition: Narrator positioned on the left, camera slightly angled from the front

text: “You couldn’t have wanted it much,” I said; “living at the bottom of the sea.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Main character centered, camera slightly angled from the front

text: “I couldn’t afford to learn it,” the Mock Turtle sighed.

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle positioned on the right, camera slightly angled from the front

text: “I only took the regular course.” “What was that?”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Mock Turtle centered, camera slightly angled from the front

text: “Reeling and Writhing, of course, to begin with,” the Mock Turtle replied;

characters.name: Mock Turtle
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: “and then the different branches of Arithmetic—Ambition, Distraction, Uglification, and Derision.”

characters.name: Mock Turtle
actions: continuing to speak to the viewer
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: “I never heard of ‘Uglification,’” I inquired.

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: I ventured to say. “What is it?”

characters.name: I
actions: continuing to speak to the viewer
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: The Gryphon lifted up both its paws in surprise.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera at eye level

text: “What! Never heard of uglifying!” it exclaimed.

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “You know what to beautify is, I suppose?”

characters.name: Gryphon
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: “Yes,” I said doubtfully: “it means—to—make—anything—prettier.”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly off-center, camera at eye level

text: “Well, then,” the Gryphon went on, “if you don’t know what to uglify is, you _are_ a simpleton.”

characters.name: Gryphon
actions: continuing to speak with a condescending tone
characters.composition: Character positioned centrally, camera slightly low angle

text: I did not feel encouraged to ask any more questions about it, so I turned to the Mock Turtle and said, “What else had you to learn?”

characters.name: I
characters.composition: Character positioned slightly off-center, camera at eye level
